item.title: What should I be thinking about?
item.description: What should I be thinking? As an IT professional, what is one question you should be regularly asking yourself? “What can I do that means I aren’t required?” If you can remove yourself, you have made a change for the better. You always want to being thinking about Elimination, Simplification, Automation, and Documentation. And thatâ€™s the beauty of IT, all these things are possible and often easy. You want to free up your time to think about the next big thing, rather than spending your time completing tasks.
